period_from.title: Period from date [including]
period_from.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. Maybe left empty for unbounded interval. This affects only the Players dataset

app_ids.title: App IDs
app_ids.description: List of APP IDs. If left empty data for all aps will be downloaded.
